html:
June 26, 2001

 

 

 

 

Advisory to Daybook Editors, Correspondents, Broadcasters:

Starting time for the Federal Election Commission’s public meeting scheduled for Thursday, June 28, has been changed from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. in the FEC’s 9th floor Hearing Room. Agenda item to be discussed is Voting Systems Standards draft, and its release for public comment.
title: FEC Changes June 28 Open Meeting Start Time to 2 p.m.
